h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Chu-Bai Spear Location
content: The Chu-Bai Spear can be found in Chapter 3 - The New West after completing the Prisoner's questline in the Pagoda Realm.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chu-Bai_Spear.md', within the main section titled 'Chu-Bai Spear', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Chu-Bai Spear Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Chu-Bai Spear can be found in Chapter 3 - The New West after completing the Prisoner's questline in the Pagoda Realm.
